api_list.api_description: Retrieves a specific entry given its name or ID.

required_parameters.name: entry
required_parameters.description: The name or ID of the entry.

optional_parameters.name: game
optional_parameters.description: The game version to query; defaults to 'botw'.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve card details based on exact name.

required_parameters.name: exact
required_parameters.description: The exact card name to search for.

optional_parameters.name: set
optional_parameters.description: A set code to limit the search to one set.

query: Can you find detailed information on a 'Moblin' entry from the Hyrule Compendium and give me exact details on the 'Black Lotus' card from the Magic: The Gathering database?
